Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Undersea Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke O'Dowd, the Human Meteor, as he uncovers a conspiracy involving a sunken Japanese submarine and rescues Toby and Peter from danger.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor, Duke's taxi service, his playboy passengers, and the initial suspicion of a following sedan.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Hospital
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the sedan occupants, leading to police involvement and a hospital visit where a new lead about a yacht emerges.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Stowaway and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to stowaway on the yacht, Toby successfully boards it, and Pete discovers a suspicious chart, leading to danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Duke observes the yacht, senses danger, and Toby's actions are revealed, while Human Meteor rushes underwater to rescue Pete and discovers the sunken submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action
Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Infiltration and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Inside the submarine, the torpedo loading operation is revealed, followed by Human Meteor's ambush, escape from divers, and surface attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation
Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor retaliates, the ship reacts, Peter's condition is assessed, and the story concludes with investigation, rescue, and a return to normalcy.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin
Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc diverges to introduce the Liberty Lads in conflict with Nazis and then shifts to a suburban mystery involving an ambulance and two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confront Nazis
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads engaged in a standoff with Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and the Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance and discover a dropped wallet, leading them to a new location.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Capture and Marine Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: The boys attempt to return the wallet, leading to their capture by Mr. Horst and a dramatic rescue by Major Bronson and the Marines.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Return and Capture
sub_scenes.description: The boys approach the garage and are lured into a trap when trying to return the wallet, leading to their capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: The boys are interrogated, and Mr. Horst plans a deadly method to get rid of them.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Betrayal and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson betrays Horst, helps the boys escape, and Marines arrive to secure the situation and rescue Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapped President's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Champ and Henry, their mission to rescue President Rosita's daughter from El Tigre, and their confrontation with Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in a South American setting and initial suspicion from local authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are interrogated by officers, leading to the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping and El Tigre's involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission Begins
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission for Rosita commences with a forced car ride, Rosita's mother's plea for help, and infiltration of El Tigre's hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House
Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother
Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Personal Vendetta
sub_scenes.description: Focus shifts to interrogation and personal vendetta as they search for Rosita, encountering resistance and revealing deeper motivations.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Operation Climax
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission culminates in a chaotic fight after receiving news of Rosita's location, leading to her rescue.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's mission in the jungle, his fight against an international spy ring, and his pursuit of sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Brawl and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is introduced fighting in the jungle, followed by a military briefing regarding his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: The Leatherneck infiltrates the jungle, but faces a hidden threat and a native ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture and Forced Cooperation
sub_scenes.description: A native man is captured, followed by Sinister Grauer's commands, and the torture of Devil Dog Dolan to obtain the sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Loss, and Vengeance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan confesses to arson, leading to chaos, the loss of Sam, and Dolan's resolve for revenge against the natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Combat, Homage, and Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan engages in combat, defeats the chief, and surprisingly earns the homage of the natives, leading to a potential alliance.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Captain Grauer faces a dilemma with his captured son, followed by fierce brawls and Dolan being rewarded and then disciplining another officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess and navigate a complex web of racketeering and personal tragedy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Blood Type Crisis
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane's investigation leads them to a hospital where they discover Miss Reilly's critical condition and the rare blood type issue.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Unraveling the Conspiracy
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane contact Elijah, a news broadcast reveals key information linking Farnacci to the murder, and they decide to find Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and the Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane search for Tom Reilly, asking locals, and then encounter Mrs. Murphy who reveals the truth before they are ambushed.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Capture, and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The ambush leads to a car chase, intervention by the Irish neighborhood, and the capture of the shooters by police.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Crisis and Community Solution
sub_scenes.description: The injured are taken to the hospital, leading to a blood transfusion crisis for Tom Reilly, which is resolved by community blood donations.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: The story concludes with plans to apprehend Farnacci and a celebration of Lassie's recovery, offering a sense of closure.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
